text: 18 GARBAGE COLLECTION Approach #1: Tuple-level — Find old versions by examining tuples directly. — Background Vacuuming vs. Cooperative Cleaning Approach #2: Transaction-level — Txns keep track of their old versions so the DBMS does not have to scan tuples to determine visibility 4 STl M 56:56/1:09:33 - Tuple Level > : - è_ $ c0 CMU Database Systems - 19 Multi-Version Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
